A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Really Disney? Is this the best you can do with the greatest saga of all time?
Maybe for casual sci-fi viewers this could be an interesting movie with nice visual effects and some good action scenes BUT if "Star wars" means something to you as it hugely means for me.. man\, what a disappointing movie! The biggest "fiasco" I've seen in my life.
 
I don´t see this movie being remembered for long time or having a 40 years special edition.
 
What a great opportunity lost!
